name: Metaphysical Meddlers
description: The Q have declared war on the Organians' recent interventions - particularly how boring they are! However, their attempts to liven things up in the galaxy may prove more dangerous than desirable for anyone who isn't immortal!
rules:
-- This is an Anomaly Event! The following rule changes will apply:
SKIRMISH PHASE
1. Ships of any rarity can be used at all difficulty levels.
2. Additional 1500 and 1800 Intel tiers are introduced, increasing the top repeating threshold to 1800 Intel.
3. Elite difficulty opponents are upgraded to Epic difficulty level, Elite difficulty rewards are upgraded to Epic difficulty rewards.
4. Epic difficulty opponent stats are 20% higher, Epic difficulty rewards are doubled.
GALAXY PHASE
1. Each Supply Mission requires 2 of each item instead of 1.
2. Turning in the Rare Item gives out 5x Victory Points.
3. Double rare reward chance increment after a failed crafting attempt.
-- There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
-- In this Hybrid Event, you will complete Ship Battles in one Phase, and Supply Missions in another Phase.
-- Unique Ship Battles and Supply Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using Ayelborne, any version of Trelane, Q, Miss Q, or Cosmic crew will provide a bonus to Ship Battles and Supply Missions.
-- Using the Species 8472 Bioship, the U.S.S. Enterprise NCC-1701-D, or the Constitution Class Ship will provide a hull bonus in Skirmish Battles.
-- Community Rewards are also available during Phase 2!
-- Every Ship Battle or Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Ayelborne, Trelane, Q, Miss Q, or Cosmic
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Romaine
featured_crew.flavor: The psychosomatic changes in Mira that caused her severe pain and hypersensitivity resulted from the Zetarians taking over her body.

action.name: Hold Me. It's Happening Again. No!

featured_crew.name: Q
featured_crew.flavor: Q wants to thank Picard for saving him at any cost. The fact that Picard isn't interested is of no consequence to Q.

action.name: Tell Me What Is It You Wish
I'm Stuck Here With You Mortals

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Whales
rewards.flavor: After being rescued from whalers by Kirk and crew in 1986, these heroes saved the world in the 23rd century by singing at a deep space probe

action.name: Admiral! There Be Whales Here!

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

ship.name: Constitution Class Ship
ship.flavor: The face of Starfleet in the 23rd century, these heavy cruisers were designed for long-term missions.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Romaine
rewards.flavor: The psychosomatic changes in Mira that caused her severe pain and hypersensitivity resulted from the Zetarians taking over her body.

action.name: Hold Me. It's Happening Again. No!
I'm Stuck Here With You Mortals

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

action.name: I'm Stuck Here With You Mortals

rewards.name: Q
rewards.flavor: Q wants to thank Picard for saving him at any cost. The fact that Picard isn't interested is of no consequence to Q.

action.name: Tell Me What Is It You Wish

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!
